text:
Hi Karan, 

i hope you're well!

My name is Jason and i work for EY, one of the big four professional finance firms in the world. I work in the area of Mergers and Acquisitions, which focuses on advising larger well known companies, on the process of buying and selling other companies. As an example, one of my last deals was advising Ferrero Roche on the purchase of Thorntons choclatier.
I am keen to know a bit about your background. What you are interested in at school and outside of school?
Please ask my any questions you can think of about life after school / college / university and how the working world really is !
I understand you are interested in money and investment banking (much like me), so ask me anything you like!
